name: Go Fish! (itch) (Joe Jastrzembski, Alex Thiedmann, Aerothorne, jbeegan, batcherus, leapah)
name_original: Go Fish! (itch) (Joe Jastrzembski, Alex Thiedmann, Aerothorne, jbeegan, batcherus, leapah)
description:
Go Fish! is a twist on the classic card game of Go Fish. In our version of the game if your opponent does not have the requested fish then you must fish it out of the pond for yourself. Certain fish are worth more points but are harder to catch. Will you play it safe or will you take your chances on the rare catches?

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2022

Controls: 

W,A,S,D or Arrow Keys to control the hook while fishing

Left Click on the fish that you would like to ask for
